abstract_summ: Clinical data of COVID-19 patients diagnosed between January 28, 2020 and February 23, 2020 at the Beijing You'an Hospital were summarized and analysed . Overall, 45 (18 men and 27 women) patients were included in this study . The average age of patients was 58 years (range, 7–94 years). 21 patients (47%) experienced underlying chronic diseases, with onother four patients having three or more chronic diseases simultaneously .
